person.persName: Granville J. Vaught (1st ky cavalry regiment)

body.p: Born in 1836. Married to Sarah E. Vaught. Children included Ara M., Ruth M., and Sallie M. Enlisted in First Kentucky Cavalry Regiment on September 11, 1861. Entered as Sergeant. Promoted 1st Sergeant, February 28, 1863. 2nd Lieutenant, July 16, 1864.
